summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the improvement of Boylston Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Union Street to East Denny Way, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 559 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
